# Load Packages

```{r}
#| label: packages

library(readxl)
library(here)
```

# Load HPS Data -

```{r}
#| label: load_CKL_data

raw_HPS <- read_xlsx(here("raw_data", "HPS-InTox_Data_Pull.xlsx"),
                     col_names = TRUE)

save(raw_HPS,
     file = here("data", "raw_data", "raw_HPS.rda"))
```
